message: task runners and managing builds for dummies
story: Alaa Attya Mohamed shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Build tools in modern web development | Alaa Attya
caption: alaa.ninja
description: At the end of any phase during the development life cycle of a web app developer should have a deployment phase. Deployment always include a lot of hassle. A developer always writes down a list of tasks which should be done before any deployment. – compile less files – minify CSS and js – optimize i…

data.message: If you have time I would really appreciate if you can shed some light on browserify :D I didn't use it before and feel that  I won't get it till I get my hands on it. Inb4 someone talk about it here in the comments :D I msn if you have experience using our perhaps you can write about it in your next article :)
Ahmad Alfy your reading my mind :D i was planning to write about browserify in my next blog :D sure i'll share it with you when i'm done
Thank you <3 I am writing something about grunt I wish I could finish this week. Lot's of interesting stuff I will be sharing isA :)
